bibl.title: A Preliminary Report on the 1999 Field Season at Marsa Nakari.
bibl.note: Northern Arizona University, first field season at Marsa Nakari (Nechesia?) on the Red Sea, 1999. - Introduction. - Survey and Mapping. - Excavations. - Pottery. - Coins. - Metal. - Other Finds. - Conclusion. The finds indicate activity during the first century C.E. and the late Roman period.
bibl.seg: SEEGER John A., A Preliminary Report on the 1999 Field Season at Marsa Nakari.

Northern Arizona University, first field season at Marsa Nakari (Nechesia?) on the Red Sea, 1999. - Introduction. - Survey and Mapping. - Excavations. - Pottery. - Coins. - Metal. - Other Finds. - Conclusion. The finds indicate activity during the first century C.E. and the late Roman period.
